product_name: Planet Bike Versa Rear Bike Rack
long_description: The Versa rear bike rack from Planet Bike is disc brake compatible. Open side rails maximize heel clearance when packs are installed. Pre-installed rack hardware provides quick, hassle-free installation. 1 size fits nearly all mountain and hybrid/road frames. Versa bike rack is made from 10mm, 6061 aluminum tubular rods for maximum strength and durability.
short_description: The Versa rear bike rack from Planet Bike is disc brake compatible.
